DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare robotic-assisted laparoscopic surgery traditional laparoscopic surgery endometrial cancer patient . The study prospective patient randomise two group 50 patient . Randomisation do Minim-programme patient age Body mass index take account . The primary endpoint operation time . The number patient study base non-inferiority design . Presumption operation time robotic-assisted laparoscopy 25 % long . Secondary endpoint include : 1. bleed 2. complication 3. conversion 4. number pelvic lymph node
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Cancer Robotic-assisted Versus Traditional Laparoscopy
DOC.criteria: Endometrial cancer operation , mean hysterectomy , bilateral salphingooophorectomy pelvic lymphadenectomy Gr 1 2 differentiation type The operation make laparoscopy operation Age 85 year young 30 year patient
